title: VELA Logistics Platform
summary: Multi-portal enterprise logistics platform (Core, Customer, Supplier) serving internal and external users in a 60+ person program.
highlights: Architected Micro Frontend system with one host and multiple remotes for Core, Customer and Supplier portals.
Implemented Nx Monorepo and multi-tenant architecture to support configuration and isolation per tenant.
Built CI/CD pipelines with Docker and Kubernetes to streamline releases and improve deployment stability.

title: SOGUS - Online Examination Platform
summary: Online examination and assessment system supporting multiple test formats (multiple choice, essay, etc.).
highlights: Led frontend team to design scalable Angular and React/NextJS architecture for a 10-person team.
Implemented flows for building tests, assigning exams and reviewing results for candidates.
Collaborated with stakeholders to clarify requirements and propose technical solutions.

title: Medbuy - E-commerce Platform
summary: E-commerce website for pharmaceutical supply chain with responsive UX and backend integration.
highlights: Developed responsive user interfaces using React and NextJS based on design specifications.
Collaborated closely with UX/UI designers to improve usability and user experience.
Integrated frontend with backend APIs and participated in containerized deployment using Docker.

title: Kensa Order System
summary: Order and revenue management system with Admin and Customer portals.
highlights: Designed and developed fullstack order management system including Admin Portal and Customer Portal.
Built REST APIs using Laravel to support order processing and reporting features.
Integrated payment gateways (VNPay, Payoo) and deployed the system on Linux with Docker.

title: Kilu - Marketplace for Used Motorbikes
summary: E-commerce marketplace for buying and selling used motorbikes.
highlights: Developed custom WordPress features based on marketplace business requirements.
Optimized website performance and SEO ranking for key pages.
Customized themes and plugins to support listing, search and transaction workflows.
